### Usage

**Linux / macOS**
```bash
chmod +x mi-unlock-linux-x86_64
./mi-unlock-linux-x86_64 --help
```

**Windows** â€” run in PowerShell or double-click:
```
mi-unlock-windows-x86_64.exe --help
```

**Android / Termux**
```bash
pkg install python
pip install mi-unlock-termux-android.whl
mi-unlock --help
```
